implementation.explanation:
🔍 Explanation
Serial.begin(115200)
Initializes serial communication at a baud rate of 115200.

This allows communication between the ESP32 and your computer so you can see the output in the Serial Monitor.

Serial.println("Hello, World!");
Sends the string "Hello, World!" to the serial monitor, followed by a new line.

delay(1000);
Waits for 1000 milliseconds (1 second) before repeating the loop.
